Yes Yes Yes, oh Yes! If you haven't played this game for some reason. This is the time. The saw blades oh the saw blades!!!

What can I say 
it's a classic 
buy it now for cheap if you haven't 
there's plenty of mods to update graphics and gameplay but honestly it still holds up more than any other game from 2004 
if you love first person shooters, sci-fi, dystopian settings and Zombies 
why the hell wouldn't you?
